original_text: When you accuse each other like that, it shows that you have already failed. It would be better to accept it when other people hurt you. Even if people rob you, it would be better to accept it.
korean_text: 너희가 피차 고발함으로 너희 가운데 이미 뚜렷한 허물이 있나니 차라리 불의를 당하는 것이 낫지 아니하며 차라리 속는 것이 낫지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: When you accuse each other like that
it shows that you have already failed
It would be better to accept it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 받아들이는 것이 더 나을 것입니다
다른 사람들이 당신을 상처 줄 때

sentences.original_text: it would be better to accept it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 받아들이는 것이 더 나을 것입니다
